title: Ok...so there are still freezes and I found out why, and should be fixed immediately.
body:
Because I held my mouse absolutely still, the game simply doesn't move. 

Sounds and everything still going on, but anything involving movement? Poof, just stops.

Come on Riot it's been at least a week or so.

replies.body: This doesn't sound related to any of the known issues that occurred recently. Are you seeing a black screen, are you seeing the match but things are frozen for a while then suddenly everything catches up? A few more details will really help me figure out what's going on.
